sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-main>
        <v-container>
            <v-text-field v-model="searchingText" class="rounded" :loading="isLoading" label="Szukaj..."
                append-inner-icon="mdi-magnify"></v-text-field>
            <!-- TODO funkcja loading przy zapytaniu -->
            <v-row>
                <v-col v-for="n in 1" :key="n">
                    <ShopCard v-for="x in numberOfCards" :onlyYourContent="seller" :key="x" cardName="" imageSrc=""
                        userAvatar="" userName="" cardDesc="" />
                </v-col>
            </v-row>
            <v-card v-if="zeroFounds" variant="tonal" class="mx-auto max-w-md">
                <v-card-title class="text-center headline">
                    Nie znaleźiono
                </v-card-title>
            </v-card>
        </v-container>
    </v-main>
</template>

<script>
import '@mdi/font/css/materialdesignicons.css'
import ShopCard from '@/components/ShopCard.vue'

export default {
    name: 'NavBar',
    components: {
        ShopCard
    },
    data() {
        return {
            isLoading: false,
            searchingText: "",
            zeroFounds: false
        }
    },
    methods: {
        async requestForCards() {
            // TODO request dla wyszukwarki

            const True = true
            if (!True) {
                this.zeroFounds = false
            }
            else {
                this.zeroFounds = true
            }

            this.isLoading = false
        }
    },
    props: {
        numberOfCards: {
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        seller: {
            type: Boolean,
            require: true
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        let timer = null
        const waitTime = 1000

        const input = document.querySelector('input')

        if (this.searchingText === "") console.log("wykonuje się")

        input.addEventListener('input', () => {
            clearTimeout(timer)
            this.isLoading = true
            this.zeroFounds = false
            timer = setTimeout(() => {
                if (this.searchingText === input.value) {
                    this.requestForCards();
                }
            }, waitTime);
        })
    }

}
</script>
